events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund immediately because this is not what I paid for.
The system identified the issue as a refund request based on the customer's description and keywords mentioning refund.
The case has been assigned to customer support agent Emily for handling the refund process.
Hello! I understand you received the wrong item, and I’m here to help you with the refund process today.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify and proceed with your refund request?
Here is my order number 123456, and I attached a photo showing the item which is completely different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your payment method within 5 business days. You do not need to return the incorrect item.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate that I don’t have to return the incorrect item.
The refund has been processed and you should see the amount credited within the next 5 days. Please reach out if you have any more questions.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and that everything has been resolved to your satisfaction.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thank you very much for your help and excellent support.
The support case has been closed following confirmation of refund receipt and customer satisfaction.
